parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the EPAS system can cause the power steering to malfunction, making it difficult or impossible to steer the vehicle, which can lead to accidents or leave the driver stranded.
symptoms: The power steering assist fault message is displayed
the steering wheel is difficult to turn
the vehicle loses power steering functionality
the traction control warning light is illuminated

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the power steering control module can cause the power steering to malfunction, making it difficult or impossible to steer the vehicle, which can lead to accidents or leave the driver stranded.
symptoms: The power steering assist fault message is displayed
the steering wheel is difficult to turn
the vehicle loses power steering functionality
and the traction control warning light is illuminated.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the steering gear box can cause the power steering to malfunction, making it difficult or impossible to steer the vehicle, which can lead to accidents or leave the driver stranded.
symptoms: The power steering assist fault message is displayed
the steering wheel is difficult to turn
the vehicle loses power steering functionality
and the traction control warning light is illuminated.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the power steering assist system can cause the vehicle to be difficult or impossible to steer, leading to accidents or loss of control.
symptoms: The power steering assist failure warning light illuminates
the vehicle is difficult to steer
the vehicle is impossible to steer.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the transmission can cause the vehicle to hesitate, jerk, or stall, leading to accidents or loss of control.
symptoms: The vehicle hesitates or jerks when shifting gears
the transmission slips or bangs into gear
the vehicle lunges or stalls when accelerating.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the PTO assembly can cause the vehicle to leak fluid, leading to damage to the transmission and other components.
symptoms: the vehicle has a burning oil smell
the vehicle has a loud grinding or whining noise.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the front axle half shaft can cause the vehicle to lose power or stability, leading to accidents or loss of control.
symptoms: The vehicle loses power or stability
the vehicle has a loud grinding or whining noise.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the water pump can cause the engine to overheat, leading to damage to the engine and potentially causing a loss of control or accident.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Engine Failure Due to Water Pump Failure
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the water pump can cause the engine to fail, leading to a loss of control or accident.
The failure of the turbocharger can cause the engine to lose power, leading to a loss of control or accident.
The intermittent stalling and engine issues can cause a loss of control or accident.
